verses.name: Leviticus 22:30
verses.text: On the same day it shall be eaten up; ye shall leave none of it until the morrow: I am the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:31
verses.text: Therefore shall ye keep my commandments, and do them: I am the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:32
verses.text: Neither shall ye profane my holy name; but I will be hallowed among the children of Israel: I am the Lord which hallow you,

verses.name: Leviticus 22:33
verses.text: That brought you out of the land of Egypt, to be your God: I am the Lord.
